624x352 and 550 MB per episode.  Don't know any more at the moment, as the download only just started.  TPBGreece, seriously, you should have this information and more in your summary.  Resolution (624x352 in this case), what codecs are used, what bitrates are used, filesize per episode, whether it is from DVD or is a digital TV stream rip, HD or standard def, etc.  This is what people use to determine whether or not something is worth bothering with.  You're not helping by saying "It says right there that the size is 5.37 GB and it is V:10 A:10 LOL!"  You're being an ignorant ass by doing that.
